com.milk.uberchat.event
Class MessageEvent

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.util.EventObject
        |
        +--com.milk.util.BaseEvent
              |
              +--com.milk.uberchat.event.MessageEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class MessageEvent
extends BaseEvent

This is the class for events having to do with chat-messages coming in from the host directed toward a particular ChatLocus.

Author:
Dan Bornstein, danfuzz@milk.com
, Copyright 1999 Dan Bornstein, all rights reserved.
See Also:

                                         ChatUser user,
                                         java.lang.String kind,
                                         java.lang.String text)
Construct and return a userBroadcast event.

Parameters:
locus - the locus in question
user - the user that said something
kind - the kind of thing that was said (see SpeechKinds)
text - the text that was spoken

systemPrivate

public static MessageEvent systemPrivate(ChatLocus locus,
                                         java.lang.Object arg)
Construct and return a systemPrivate event.

Parameters:
locus - the locus in question
arg - the argument that the system sent (often, but not necessarily, a string)

getLocus

public ChatLocus getLocus()
Get the source of this event as a ChatLocus. It is merely a convenience to avoid having to do the cast yourself.

Returns:
the source of this event as a ChatLocus

getText

public java.lang.String getText()
Get the argument of this event as a text string. It is merely a convenience to avoid having to do the cast/methods yourself.

Returns:
the argument of this event as a string

getDetails

public UserBroadcastDetails getDetails()
Get the argument of this event as a UserBroadcastDetails. It is merely a convenience to avoid having to do the cast yourself.

Returns:
the argument of this event as a UserBroadcastDetails
